General.Name: Mirasol Resources Ltd
General.Description: Mirasol Resources Ltd. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties primarily in Chile and Argentina. The company explores for gold, silver, and copper deposits. Its flagship projects include the Sobek Cu project, which covers an area of 11,120 hectares located in northern Chile; and the Inca Gold that covers an area of 16,300 hectares located on the Paleocene belt of Chile. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 355 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2G8
